entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-07-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • ILVerify throws System.BadImageFormatException on invoke #71688
  • Assertion failed '(shiftAmount == scale) || (shiftAmount == 0)' #71684
    7.0.0
  • AppBarButton PointerPressed Event doesn't fire #71681
  • Remove old multi-dimensional array code #71678
    8.0.0
  • Improve hoisting, CSE, LSRA for MD array accesses #71676
    Future
  • RyuJIT: support cloning loop nests with multi-dimensional array accesses #71674
    8.0.0
  • Widespread regressions after #71498 (Spans to use ref fields) #71667
    7.0.0
  • Create minidump with nativeaot #71666
  • double Microsoft.UI.Input.PointerPoint.Position should be int #71665
  • Mono fails new test src/tests/JIT/Directed/Arrays/nintindexoutofrange.csproj #71656
  • Assertion failed 'this->OperIsBinary()' during 'LSRA allocate' #71655
  • PGO: Static profile affects loop alignment where it's not supposed to do #71649
    8.0.0
  • Generic Math - API tweaks #71648
    7.0.0
  • Request: Add PDB checksum (type 19) to ModuleDCStart/ModuleDCStop events #71644
  • Net50 SortedSet<string>.add do not add items to the collection #71643
  • Segmentation fault while running dotnet #71642
  • .NET 7.0 BigInteger.GreatestCommonDivisor bug. #71641
    7.0.0
  • .NET 7 dotnet-trace output has `???` in stacks on Android #71640
  • Importer's spilling logic for `stfld` is not correct #71638
    8.0.0
  • Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration APIs haven't been AOT-annotated #71654
  • `ldelem[a]` importation treats pointers as `object`s #71636
    7.0.0
  • AssemblyLoadContext never get unloaded if there's a dynamic operation #71629
  • RyuJIT: Tight loop performance regression #71628
    8.0.0
  • GC slow since .net 7 Preview 5/6/7 somewhere. #71627
    7.0.0
  • Test failure GC\\LargeMemory\\API\\gc\\keepalive\\keepalive.cmd #71624
    7.0.0

Closed

  • Copy/paste error in GenTree::GetRegSpillFlagByIdx for xarch hwintrinsics #52473
    7.0.0
  • Box-unbox optimization swallows InvalidCastException on different signs #71632
    7.0.0
  • Support value numbering of multi-dimensional array accesses #68948
    Future
  • Codegen for multi-dimensional arrays is poor #35293
    Future
  • JIT: inefficient multidimensional array access vis Jit32 (and in general) #8569
    Future
  • Multidimensional array performance #5481
    Future
  • ServiceProvider: InvalidOperationException not thrown for circular dependencies at runtime #71489
  • IOC scope validation design philosophy #71550
  • [Mono][Android][x64] JIT.HardwareIntrinsics.X86.*/Jit.Methodical.* tests failed #65840
    7.0.0
  • Type.Missing doesn't convert to nullable enum in Method.Invoke #70925
    7.0.0
  • RyuJIT: Improving multi-dimensional array accesses #60785
    7.0.0
  • Add ability to stream large binary content to Utf8JsonWriter #67337
    Future
  • Expose `IsSupported` properties on the vector types #69036
    7.0.0
  • [Perf] ARM64 regression in System.Diagnostics.Perf_Activity.ActivityAllocations #68624
    7.0.0
  • StringComparer.CurrentCultureIgnoreCase.GetHashCode is broken (on Blazor) #70441
  • tracing/eventactivityidcontrol/eventactivityidcontrol/eventactivityidcontrol.sh failed on rolling build #60679
  • [Wasm][AOT] Profiled AOT compilation fails with Segmentation fault #70773
    7.0.0
  • arm64 crossgen2 performance measurements #49013
    7.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] Enable Reflection library tests in Linux-ARM64 #70010
    7.0.0
  • CI failure in "Build Browser wasm Release AllSubsets_Mono" leg #59736
  • Improve HostBuilder and WebApplicationBuilder Configuration integration #61634
    7.0.0
  • Mono build failure: Could not resolve type 'System.Threading.AutoreleasePool' #61218
  • Regex - Support Possessive Quantifiers #24381
    Future
  • [JIT] Performance bug Windows vs Linux #71311
  • emcc-props.json leads to wrong path for JsonToItemsTaskFactory.dll #59619
    7.0.0
  • Bad X509Certificate2..ctor in .NET 6 on Android #71603
  • Mono does not specify source to utf-8, and fails to build on MBCS locale #69781
    7.0.0
  • Add FreeBSD to mono build in runtime.yml #57487
    Future
  • How to hot reload assemblies in mono runtime #65663
  • [net6][iOS] `Ran out of trampolines of type 1` running on x64 simulator #68808
  • Test failures on Android: error: device 'emulator-5556' not found #70056
  • how to check the program run state whether can call mono_alc_free #61762
    Future
  • Incorrect result when using Unsafe.Add in Release mode #71601
    7.0.0
  • SocketsHttpHandler: GOAWAY on connection handshake #63715
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • JIT: Fix generating unrepresentable nullchecks on ARM64 #71687
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Simplify CEEInfo::getTypeForPrimitiveValueClass #71686
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Make Type.GetTypeCode an intrinsic #71685
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix S.R.InteropServices remarks #71683
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, 7.0.0
  • Update design and expose new attributes for the CustomTypeMarshaller support #71682
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, new-api-needs-documentation, source-generator
  • Fix `ldelem[a] <pointer type>` import #71679
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • TypedByReference should be treated as a normal valuetype for calling convention purposes #71675
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Don't set CORINFO_FLG_CUSTOMLAYOUT for auto-layout structs #71673
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add a fabricbot task to add issues to the AppModel project #71672
    area-Meta
  • Fixed issue #71641 #71671
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Use OS-provided RSA OAEP implementation for Android #71670
    area-System.Security, os-android
  • Update branding to 6.0.8 #71668
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • (NativeAOT) Re-enable Linux System.Reflection tests after fix #71664
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Less aggressive `stfld` spilling #71663
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Polyfill the incremental generator ForAttributeWithMetadataName from roslyn (for EventSourceGeneration). #71662
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Implement ControlledExecution API #71661
    area-VM-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Hold stop-go lock when requesting CCW #71660
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Adjust weights of blocks with profile inside loops in non-profiled methods #71659
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Make JsonTypeInfo.CreateJsonPropertyInfo linker safe #71658
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Integrate mibc mono config extension #71657
  • Polyfill the incremental generator ForAttributeWithMetadataName from roslyn (for JsonGenerator). #71653
    area-System.Text.Json
  • Polyfill the incremental generator ForAttributeWithMetadataName from roslyn (for LibraryImportGenerator). #71652
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Polyfill the incremental generator ForAttributeWithMetadataName from roslyn (for LoggingGenerator). #71651
    area-Extensions-Logging
  • Simplify JsonPropertyInfo list implementation and expose IsExtensionData properties #71650
    area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.0
  • Tar, Zip: respect umask when creating files. #71647
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Implement GetIndexOfFirstNonAsciiChar intrinsic on AArch64 #71637
    area-System.Text.Encoding, community-contribution
  • Disable a test for ilasm roundtripping #71634
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fixed the error for missing Debug directory #71623
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution

Merged

  • Call stateless free for linear collection marshallers #71669
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0
  • Do not spill "mis-sized" struct args passed on stack #71399
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Make getTypeForPrimitiveValueClass treat different signs as different types #71633
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Fix: using default value for nullable enum parameter throws ArgumentException #71388
    area-System.Reflection
  • Optimize multi-dimensional array access #70271
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Exposing static bool IsSupported { get; } on Vector<T> and Vector64/128/256<T> #71240
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [mono][wasm] Add a minimal version of gsharedvt for llvmonly, enabled… #70867
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • [mono][aot] Avoid inflating methods with instantiation with a wrong a… #70926
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Blazor Hybrid iOS & Mac Catalyst Performance Profiling #68685
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Release global lock before throwing exceptions from the Unix WaitSystem #71626
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Refactoring IShiftOperators to take a `TOther` #71405
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Add Conditional nodes and Arm64 code generation #71616
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasm][debugger]Fix debugging when it's using a external library without debug information #71560
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Polyfill the incremental generator ForAttributeWithMetadataName from roslyn. #70911
  • Set utf-8 for mono on msvc #70994
    area-Infrastructure-mono, community-contribution
  • Add a build lane for FreeBSD Mono. #69715
    os-freebsd, area-Build-mono
  • Update area-owners.md #71639
    area-Meta
  • Ensure JsonTypeInfo.Configure() is called once even when exceptions are thrown #71630
    area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.0
  • Ensure JsonPropertyInfo<T> matches property type and not the converter type #71612
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • [LoongArch64] Fixed the assert error within the "CodeGen::genCodeForNullCheck()" #71577
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Handle out-of-bounds access to locals in block morphing #71617
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Get S.C.Immutable.Tests running with NativeAOT #71527
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Throw protocol error returned by GoAway on HTTP/2 connection negotation #71572
    area-System.Net.Http

Updated

  • Remove Microsoft.Diagnostics.Tracing.EventSource.Redist #71573
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing
  • Fix EventSource deadlock #71574
    area-Tracing-coreclr
  • DefaultBinder named parameter support skipping default parameters #71013
    area-System.Reflection
  • changing CPU from int to double #66743
    area-PAL-coreclr
  • Update all internal marshallers to the new model #71470
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
  • Add an Azure NPM registry #71393
    area-Infrastructure
  • Various createdump fixes. Smaller MacOS dump size, better logging/stats, misc cleanup, etc. #71569
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [WIP]Add reflection introspection support for function pointers #71516
    area-System.Reflection, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Add an ETW event for reporting richer debug information back #71263
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add support for the Aho-Corasick algorithm in regexes. #71588
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, community-contribution
  • Bring over distributed transactions support for Windows #71433
    area-System.Transactions
  • [DRAFT][MONO] Move marshal-ilgen into a component #71203
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • On 64 bit platforms, "stelem.ref" and "ldelema" ignore the high bits of a native int index #71571
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Bump Newtonsoft.Json from 12.0.3 to 13.0.1 in /src/libraries/Common/tests/System/Net/Prerequisites/NetCoreServer #71180
    area-System.Net, community-contribution, .NET
  • Add support for int keyed dictionaries to configuration binder #71609
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • Updating a few BitConverter APIs to be intrinsic #71567
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Ensure that CreateChecked, CreateSaturating, and CreateTruncating are publicly exposed #71493
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [Mono] Fix all remaining C4018 warnings and enable the check during build #71269
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [ILVerify] Reporting verification error on protected blocks with more than one handler #64582
    area-ILVerification, Future
  • ARM64 - Allow double constants to CSE more often #65176
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Using /unicode when running ildasm.exe roundtrip tests #71163
    area-Infrastructure-mono, 7.0.0
  • [API Implementation]: SafeFileHandle overloads for SetCreationTime, SetLastAccessTime, SetLastWriteTime #60507
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Use crypto.subtle for AES on Browser WASM #71501
    arch-wasm, area-System.Security
  • Fix for issue#58421 #62624
    area-Serialization
  • Unix arm64 atomics #71512
    arch-arm64, area-PAL-coreclr
  • Retire .NET 5 #69911
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • NonBacktracking locking fixes and cleanup #71234
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • [QUIC] API QuicListener #71579
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Net.Quic
  • Redo minor cleanups in System.Runtime.Numerics #71274
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • ConfigurationBinder should support binding private properties from ba… #71039
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • Improve Generics support in System.Text.Json.SourceGeneration #71619
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • Return receive flags from ReceiveMessageFromAsync on Windows #71462
    area-System.Net.Sockets
  • Unix: Move 'FileNotFound to DirectoryNotFound' handling to GetExceptionForIoErrno. #70661
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Use in-tree ilasm to run test suite natively on s390x #71326
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • [wasm] JSImport, JSExport and related API types for JavaScript interop #71500
    arch-wasm, new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • Add initial support for Freebsd.arm64 #71486
    os-freebsd, area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Linker to NativeAOT sync #71485
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add Generic Enum.TryFormat() #71590
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-07-05
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [Hot cold splitting] Support split-eh #1918
  • [Hot Cold Splitting] Redesign the hot cold mapping data structure to allow fast lookup #1903

PullRequests

Updated

  • Support EH funclet splitting in Crossgen2 #1926
  • Reflection Based Testing + Removed LinkedList #1917

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-07-05
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • "Permission denied" when running `dotnet script` if the current working directory contains a file named `dotnet` #25551
  • installed global tool is missing #25767
    Discussion
  • Compiler crashing when using !! (Bang-Bang-Operator) in async methods #24905
  • Wow, that looks bad! I don't have time at the moment to investigate, but thanks for reporting. I'll try to look at it soon. #26418

Updated

  • Problems in .NET 6 Cross Platform Build for win, linux and mac(x64 & arm64) #25446
    Discussion
  • Building net*-android apps always restore Microsoft.NETCore.App.Host.linux #25679
    Discussion
  • WPF publish adds Windows Forms dlls (including design time dlls) #25869
  • Consider specifying ResolvableSdkPattern in MSBuild sdk resolvers' manifests. #26009
    Backlog
  • Inconsistent perms on some directories SDK writes into /tmp #26022
    7.0.1xx
  • dotnet pack replaces wildcard version of reference with current actual version #26167
  • Create FabricBot rule for compat issues #26166
    7.0.1xx
  • dotnet run fails if run from a directory named `;)` #13954
    Backlog
  • Missing packages for Ubuntu 21.04 aarch64/arm64 #17683
    Discussion
  • `build` vs `publish` -- can they be friends? #26247
  • New project system doesn't copy PDBs from packages #1458
    6.0.4xx

PullRequests

Created

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1862266 #26442
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'release/6.0.3xx' #26441
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.3xx' => 'release/6.0.4xx' #26440
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Remoev the build retry and increase the test retry #26439
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Remove all of the extra run helix tests scripts for running non-helix… #26438
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • Update the RID target from lower Linux to the latest one #25909
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update the hardcoded netcoreapp3.0 to the current framework #24979
  • Update branding to 6.0.108 #26435
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update branding to 3.1.422 #26434
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update branding to 6.0.303 #26436
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Update the RIDs target to the latest one #26096
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update Test project TestAppEchoDotnetRoot to current framework #22784
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Delete unnecessary test project files #22233
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add a notification for the compatibility area #25959
    Area-Infrastructure
  • upgrade our version of newtonsoft #26288
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Removing default ProduceReferenceAssembly value for F# #26306
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [QB Mode] Fix Workload Restore Crashes #26405
    Servicing-approved, 6.0.4xx
  • Support for msbuild/build event #26427
    Area-NetSDK
  • Allow dotnet workload update print-download-link-only to use fallback and work with prior SDK versions #26369
    Area-Workloads
  • For build-from-source builds of .NET, opt-out of Microsoft telemetry #25935
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [24068] Remove Legacy -- behavior and use of UnparsedTokens #25854
    Area-Infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-07-05
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Champion "readonly for locals and parameters" #188
    Backlog
  • [Proposal]: Static abstract members in interfaces #4436
    Working Set

PullRequests

Merged

  • Surround terminal token ('using') with single quotes in grammar #6255

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-07-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Find a way to safely restore the switch dispatch optimization for floating-point types #62390
    C# 12.0
  • Avoid using `SolutionOptionSet` (and `ILegacyWorkspaceOptionService`) with `OptionStore` #62384
  • GetOrCreateCompilationWithAnalyzersAsync throwing null reference exception in integration tests #62381
  • Visual Studio inserting // into C# comments #62380
  • 'CSharpWrappingCodeRefactoringProvider' encountered an error #62379
  • 'Convert to raw string without leading whitespace' erroneously strips trailing whitespace #62376
  • Fix double write of Microsoft.VisualStudio.Text.Internal.dll #62372
  • File and required modifiers are missing from CSharpAccessibilityFacts.GetAccessibilityAndModifiers #62371
  • `#nullable enable` adds a "not CLS-compliant" diagnostic #62368
  • search handler assertion failure #62365

Closed

  • Source generators can't respect DDD #62377
  • Move static members to another type is suggested for top-level statements #59470
    17.3
  • VS setting are very inconsistent in terms of native/custom control usage #62359
  • Generated constructor with invalid parameter name #62162
  • .editorconfig code analysis suppressions not always honored #62064

PullRequests

Created

  • Increase timeout for unix single machine job #62393
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add array initialization optimization fix and initial unit tests #62392
    Area-Compilers
  • Handle diff3 conflict markers #62391
    Area-Compilers
  • Change the data-flow path for searching for attributes to prevent fewer intermediary tables. #62389
    Area-Compilers
  • Remove expensive and unneeded syntax tree verification #62382
    Area-Compilers
  • Async save integration testing #62378
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merge 'file-local types' to main #62375
    Area-Compilers
  • Switch to a callback for cleaning up resources instead of passing in an explicit IDisposable. #62373
    Area-Compilers
  • Prevent assert from being hit #62366
    Area-IDE
  • [EnC] Allow renaming methods, properties, events etc. #62364
    Area-Compilers

Merged

  • Merge release/dev17.0-vs-deps to release/dev17.2 #62297
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/semi-auto-props #62347
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Give member refactoring tools consistent field selection #62102
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Add suggested lookup tests #62383
    Area-Compilers, Test
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #62385
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main to features/cache-artifacts #62387
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/use-azure-build-machines #62386
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Publish main-vs-deps VS PRs #62388
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Do not strip underscore if the result name will be invalid #62290
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Add an Integration test for 'Go to global usings' #62217
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #62374
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • REmove use of Lazy in DeclarationTable for rarely used values. #62324
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Do not look for load/reference directives when there can't be any #62323
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Address prototype comments in file types branch #62335
    Area-Compilers
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #62225
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • File types IDE changes #62215
    Area-IDE, Area-Compilers

Updated

  • Merge main to features/cache-artifacts #62398
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/use-azure-build-machines #62397
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #62396
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.2 to release/dev17.3 #62395
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.0-vs-deps to release/dev17.2 #62394
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Add support for file-types in SymbolKey. #62218
    Area-IDE
  • Skip the balanced switch dispatch optimization for patterns on floating point inputs #62322
    Area-Compilers
  • [EnC] Support more symbol deletes #62151
    Area-Compilers
  • Always clear diagnostics when ending a debug session #62270
    Area-IDE
  • Document Outline Feature #61784
    Area-IDE
  • Reuse prior TableEntry values in the increment NodeTable builder if possible. #62320
    Area-Compilers
  • Make sure options in Tools → Options are persisted #62357
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Remove LangVer check from extended nameof binding #62339
    Area-IDE, Area-Compilers, 17.4
  • All incremental generator perf work #62159
    Area-Compilers
  • Make more command handlers synchronous #62086
    Area-IDE, 17.3

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-07-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Blazor Catch-All Route ignores razor page routes #42584
  • [Blazor][Wasm] Dynamic and extensible authentication requests #42580
  • Remove `Authentication` property from `WebApplicationBuilder` #42577
    7.0-preview7
  • Blazor: Model-specific validation errors of a list of child models cannot be shown individually #42575
    Backlog
  • Blazor Wasm Microsoft.JSInterop.JSException: Could not find 'blazorCulture.get' #42574
  • Can't open multiple windows from blazor server. #42570
  • If there is no operation for a long time, the wpf which use blazor hybrid will crash. #42569

Closed

  • Swagger does NOT work with non-'/' path base #42559
  • Add status code attribute 409 Conflict to DefaultApiConventions.Post #42467
  • Typo in ArgumentNullException.ThrowIfNull #42558
    7.0-rc1
  • Move OIDC PKCE state #41548
    7.0-preview7
  • Unable to create Blazor Server project with Identity feature. #42242
  • https://github.com/dotnet/announcements/issues/222 issue -- #42507
  • Set OpenApiSecurityRequirement for local JWT bearer-based scenarios #42473
    7.0-rc1
  • Incorrect groupIdentity/Identity for protobuf item template. #37815
    6.0.x
  • Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.Testing is broken in SDK 6.0.201 #40614
    6.0.4
  • Blazor: virtualization on grid flickering #42552
  • [Razor] IHtmlHelper.ActionLink/RouteLink add Exception on invalid route #42556
  • Visual Studio 2022 Couldn't start the SPA development server with command 'npm start' #42568
  • About Virtualization in blazor vs large collection #42518
  • Blazor: Prerendered HeadContent gets replaced on WASM startup even if it is not changed #42527
  • chinese characters shows ascii code in web page, #42541
  • Blazor Drag and Drop broke between .NET Core 3.0 and .NET 6.0 #42517
  • `app.UsePathBase(pathBase);` does NOT work but `context.Request.PathBase = new PathString(pathBase);` does? #42553

PullRequests

Created

  • Slightly clean up template README #42587
    area-infrastructure
  • Remove Auth validation when Form File upload #42586
    area-runtime
  • Remove Authentication property from WebApplicationBuilder #42585
    area-web-frameworks, feature-authentication
  • Update branding to 6.0.8 #42583
    area-infrastructure, 6.0.x
  • Remove support for setting default scheme from user-jwts #42578
    area-web-frameworks, feature-authentication
  • CreatedResult should accept null location #42576
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks
  • Add gRPC trimming end-to-end test #42572
    area-grpc
  • [Infrastructure] Update SDK version #42571

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-07-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Android] OnDestroy is currently firing twice #8541
    6.0-sr3
  • Source Generator adds "NET5_0_OR_GREATER" and not "NET6_0_OR_GREATER" #8540
  • IServiceScope should get disposed when the associated window is destroyed or closed #8538
    6.0-servicing
  • [Android] Create Date picker dialog on demand instead of inside CreatePlatformView #8537
    .NET 7
  • CollectonView dont update automatically #8534
  • When Shell.NavBarIsVisible="False" open and close the flyout programmatically is not working #8532
  • Shape / Geometries Bindable Properties not working #8530
    6.0.300
  • Windows Entry with Text (Child of Frame) causes freeze #8529
  • Button with Image on iOS and MacOS always missalign #8528
  • MauiImage resource not work with TintColor #8527
  • IOS Contentpage BackgroundColor Transparent not working #8526
  • publish android,because of use of ZIndex,Crash. #8525

Closed

  • Blazor startup not working on Android #7965
  • Switching language on Android results in a crash while navigating if resource manager used (i18n) #6732
    6.0-sr3
  • AppShell crashed on Android with "No view found for id 0x1 (unknown) for fragment ShellItemRenderer..." #7940
    6.0-sr3

PullRequests

Created

  • Propagate appearing/disappearing/deactivated #8542
  • Replace Newtonsoft.Json dependency with System.Text.Json in Resizetizer #8539
  • More Unpackaged Support #8536
  • Invalidate Path if something in a PathFigure or PathGeometry changes #8533
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️

Merged

  • [Android] Fix crash using Shadows on ListView ViewCell #8269
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, fatal, area/ListView, 6.0-sr3

Updated

  • Fix DatePicker on Android so that it can GC #8505
    do-not-merge, area/controls 🎮
  • [android] remove ColorStateList(int[][],int[]) usage #5654
    area/perf 🏎️, .NET 7
